item.title: By: Michael Michael
item.dc:creator: Michael Michael
item.description: The history of Bitcoin is the history of a radical revolution in the financial sector. Congratulations to everyone that has embraced this innovation. This is just the beginning of greater things to come.
item.content:encoded: The history of Bitcoin is the history of a radical revolution in the financial sector. Congratulations to everyone that has embraced this innovation. This is just the beginning of greater things to come.
